sourcesContent:
import style from './Detail.module.css' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const Detail = ()=>{ const { id } = useParams() const [character, setCharacter] = useState('') useEffect(()=>{ const URL_BASE = "https://rickandmortyapi.com/api" const API_KEY = "ef19ec2c194a.fa1ee29143e598093d2f" fetch(`${URL_BASE}/character/${id}?key=${API_KEY}`) .then((resp)=>resp.json()) .then((data)=>{ (data.name) ? setCharacter(data) : window.alert('No esta esa ID') }) },[]) return (
Volver

{character.name}

{character.id}

{ (character.status !== 'Alive') ? (character.status === 'Dead') ?

{character.status}

:

{character.status}

:

{character.status}

}

{character.status}

Origen:

{character.origin?.name}

Gender:

{character.gender}

Species:

{character.species}

) } export default Detail
